headline: Premium Guard Inc. Announces Licensing Partnership with Procter & Gamble to Launch Febreze™ Cabin Air Filters
summary: Premium Guard Inc. (PGI), a leading manufacturer and supplier of high-quality automotive filtration products, announced a new licensing agreement with Procter & Gamble (P&G) to develop, distribute and sell Febreze™ Cabin Air Filters powered by PUREFLOW® Air Filtration Technology — bringing to market the trusted brand equity of Febreze with PUREFLOW®'s proven performance to redefine vehicle interior air quality (ViAQ™).
